current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for greater transparency and efficiency in the
			 procedures followed by the Federal Communications Commission, and for
			 other purposes.

require each notice of proposed rulemaking or order adopting a rule or amending an existing rule

			 performance measures for evaluating the effectiveness of the program
			 activity; and

require each notice of proposed rulemaking or order adopting a rule or amending an existing rule
			 that  substantially changes (or proposes to substantially change) a
			 program activity to contain—

performance measures for evaluating the effectiveness of the program activity as changed (or
			 proposed to be changed); or

a finding that existing performance measures will effectively evaluate the program activity as
			 changed (or proposed to be changed).
